```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(forcats)
library(ggpubr)
#library(writexl)
library(emmeans)
library(lme4)
library(car)
library(lmerTest)
library(svglite)
```

```{r}
transporters <- read.csv("../../data/qRT-PCR/07222022-transporter-gene-study.csv", fileEncoding = 'UTF-8-BOM')

transporters <- transporters %>% filter(Sample != "calib")
  
transporters <- transporters %>% mutate(Tissue = str_sub(Sample, start=-3L, end=-1L),
                                        Treatment = str_extract(Sample, "[:alpha:]+(?=[:digit:])"),
                                        Sample = str_extract(Sample, "[:alnum:]+(?=-)"))

transporters <- transporters %>% mutate(Treatment = factor(Treatment, c("S", "M", "Flo", "Fhi", "C")),
                                        Tissue = factor(Tissue, c("ret", "hyp")))

transporters_long <- transporters %>% pivot_longer(cols=c("Pgp.RGE", "Bcrp.RGE"), names_to = "gene", values_to="rge")

transporters_long <- transporters_long %>% mutate(gene = str_extract(gene, "[:alpha:]+(?=.)"))
transporters_long <- transporters_long %>% mutate(gene = factor(as.factor(gene), c("Pgp", "Bcrp")))
```

## Comparing chronic saline/morphine for Bcrp (repeat of P-gp, Bergum 2022)

```{r}
chronic <- transporters_long %>% filter(Treatment %in% c("C", "S"))
chronic

chronic_lm <- lmer(rge ~ gene * Tissue * Treatment + (1|Sample), data=chronic)
plot(chronic_lm, type=c("p","smooth"), col.line=1)
lattice::qqmath(chronic_lm)

chronic_log2_lm <- lmer(log2(rge) ~ gene * Tissue * Treatment + (1|Sample), data=chronic)
plot(chronic_log2_lm, type=c("p","smooth"), col.line=1)
lattice::qqmath(chronic_log2_lm)

shapiro.test(chronic$rge)
shapiro.test(log2(chronic$rge))


anova(chronic_log2_lm)

emmeans::emmeans(chronic_log2_lm, pairwise ~ Treatment | Tissue, by="gene")$contrasts
emmeans::emmeans(chronic_log2_lm, pairwise ~ Tissue | Treatment, by="gene")$contrasts
emmeans::emmeans(chronic_log2_lm, pairwise ~ gene | Treatment, by="Tissue")$contrasts

chronic_sumstats <- chronic %>% group_by(Treatment, Tissue, gene) %>% summarise(
  n = n(),
  mean = mean(rge),
  sd = sd(rge),
  log2_mean = mean(log2(rge)),
  log2_sd = sd(log2(rge))
)
chronic_sumstats


chronic_plot <- ggplot() +
  stat_summary(data=chronic, aes(x=Treatment, y=rge, fill=Tissue),
               fun = 'mean', geom="bar", width=0.75, position="dodge") +
  geom_errorbar(data=chronic_sumstats, aes(x=Treatment, ymin=mean-sd,
                                           ymax=mean+sd, fill=Tissue),
                width=0.2, position=position_dodge(width=0.75)) +
  geom_point(data=chronic, aes(x=Treatment, y=rge, fill=Tissue),
             stat="identity", position=position_dodge(width=0.75)) +
  facet_grid(gene~Tissue, scales="free_y") +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0, 0.1))) +
  #scale_fill_manual(values=c("maroon1", "springgreen3")) +
  theme_bw()

chronic_plot

#ggsave(filename="../../figures/qRT-PCR/chronic_trt_plot.svg", plot=chronic_plot, height=4, width=6)


chronic_log_plot <- ggplot() +
  stat_summary(data=chronic, aes(x=Treatment, y=log2(rge), fill=Tissue),
               fun = 'mean', geom="bar", width=0.75, position="dodge") +
  geom_errorbar(data=chronic_sumstats, aes(x=Treatment, ymin=log2_mean-log2_sd,
                                         ymax=log2_mean+log2_sd, fill=Tissue),
                width=0.2, position=position_dodge(width=0.75)) +
  geom_point(data=chronic, aes(x=Treatment, y=log2(rge), fill=Tissue),
             stat="identity", position=position_dodge(width=0.75)) +
  facet_grid(gene~Tissue, scales="free_y") +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0.1, 0.25))) +
  #scale_fill_manual(values=c("maroon1", "springgreen3")) +
  theme_bw()

chronic_log_plot

#ggsave(filename="../../figures/qRT-PCR/chronic_trt_log.svg", plot=chronic_log_plot, height=4, width=6)
```

```{r}

plot(transporter_lm, type=c("p","smooth"), col.line=1)
lattice::qqmath(transporter_lm)

transporter_log2_lm <- lmer(log2(rge) ~ gene * Tissue * Treatment + (1|Sample), data=transporters_long)
plot(transporter_log2_lm, type=c("p","smooth"), col.line=1)
lattice::qqmath(transporter_log2_lm)

shapiro.test(transporters_long$rge)
shapiro.test(log2(transporters_long$rge))


anova(transporter_log2_lm)

emmeans::emmeans(transporter_log2_lm, pairwise ~ Treatment | Tissue, by="gene")$contrasts
emmeans::emmeans(transporter_log2_lm, pairwise ~ Tissue | Treatment, by="gene")$contrasts
emmeans::emmeans(transporter_log2_lm, pairwise ~ gene | Treatment, by="Tissue")$contrasts
```
